title: 97/250/EC: Commission Decision of 25 March 1997 approving the programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis in Austria (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 March 1997 approving the programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis in Austria (Text with EEA relevance) (97/250/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis from Austria is hereby approved for a further period of three years.
Austria shall bring into force by 1 April 1997 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 April 1997.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 45, 15. 2. 1997, p. 48.
(3) OJ No L 55, 11. 3. 1995, p. 45.
